casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Theodore, Appellant, v. Ohio Bureau of Workers’ Compensation, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Theodore v. Ohio Bur. of Workers’ Comp. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 531.]

(No. 96-1928 Submitted June 24, 1998 Decided August 5, 1998.) William Z. Christoff, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Dennis L. Hufstader, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
